meanings.definition: A woman who inherits property or a title from a relative.
meanings.sent1: The inheritresses received the old castle from their grandfather.
meanings.sent2: The inheritresses were happy to receive the family heirlooms.
meanings.sent3: The inheritresses joked about becoming queens overnight.
meanings.sent4: The inheritresses stood tall like pillars of the family legacy.
meanings.sent5: The inheritresses' responsibility was to preserve the ancestral home.

meanings.definition: Women who are entitled to inherit property or a title from a relative.
meanings.sent1: Inheritresses often face challenges in managing inherited estates.
meanings.sent2: The inheritresses awaited the reading of the will with anticipation.
meanings.sent3: The inheritresses shared stories of their unexpected windfall.
meanings.sent4: The inheritresses' presence added grace to the family gatherings.
meanings.sent5: The inheritresses' lineage was traced back for generations.
